name: Aura PR (Scotland) Ltd
description:
Led by Chartered PR practitioner and CIPR Fellow, Laura Sutherland, Aura develops informed strategies and campaigns around your business objectives, using communications tools that are relevant to your audience. Timing, relevancy, adding value and knowing your audience is key.
Aura thrives on the fast-paced nature of the PR profession, not only does it develop client businesses but Aura invests in continuous professional development.
